title: Python HTML Output
text:
Note



This example is based on https://r-wasm.github.io/quarto-live/other/py_output.html#example-altair-interactive-visualisation.
The quarto-live extension has support for displaying several types of IPython rich output and Jupyter Widgets with interactive code blocks.
